String.string: Thank you very much! Let's continue to fight together, my friend!
It's time to move on to Kelsaik's Nest.
Find another teleportal in Vale of Spires that has traces of Thulsa's magic.
Use the {@LinkCreature:251#1502#Teleportal} to go to Kelsaik's Nest. [You must select Kelsaik's Nest (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:251#1502#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Someone is hiding behind a barricade.
Use the {@LinkCreature:3010#5001#Teleportal} to exit Kelsaik's Nest.
Tell {@linkcreature:251#1042#Jelena} what happened at Kelsaik's Nest.
Tell {@linkcreature:84#1088#Yunari} that you have good news.
Report the deaths of Thulsa, Killian, and the rampant Kelsaik to Kaia at Kaiator Command Center. [Speak to {@linkcreature:84#1088#Yunari} to enter the Kaiator Command Center.]
Report the deaths of Thulsa, Killian, and the rampant Kelsaik to Commander Tamur.
